name: Spell Motifs
pages: Spells interact with the world. Sometimes, spells may not be powerful enough to interact in major ways, $(l)especially if one has been cast recently. I wonder why?

pages.title: Break Block Motif
pages.text: Inputs a location and breaks a block at that location.$(br2)$(1)$(l)C, D, F, G, D, E, F, D $()$(1)$(br)[vector] -> [] Spell$(br)$(2)will always execute.
